resources.string: azGeoQuiz
q1: Canberra is the capital of Australia.
q 2 :The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
q 3 :The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
q 4 :The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
q 5 :The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
q 6 : Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
q 7 : Goldfish only have a memory of three seconds
q 8 : The capital of Libya is Benghazi
q 9 : Roger Federer has won the most Wimbledon titles of any player
q 10 : An octopus has five hearts
q 11 : Brazil is the only country in the Americas to have the official language of Portuguese
q 12 : The Great Wall of China is visible from space
q 13 : Flying in an aeroplane is statistically safer than driving in a car
q 14 : The currency of France is the Franc
q 15 : A metre is further than a yard
q 16 : Nicolas Cage and Michael Jackson both married the same woman
q 17 : The highest mountain in England is Ben Nevis
q 18 : The Channel Tunnel is the longest rail tunnel in the world
